title: Run regression tests for FO-06 and FO-07
description:
Run regression tests to ensure FO-08 did not break existing versions.

Test commands:
node --import tsx e2e/fo-06.test.ts
node --import tsx e2e/fo-07.test.ts

Both tests must pass. FO-08 has its own copy of modified components, so it should not affect FO-06 or FO-07.

If any test fails, investigate and fix the regression.

Do not close this tick until both regression tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-06.test.ts passes AND node --import tsx e2e/fo-07.test.ts passes
